news.title: Tsunami warnings across Pacific Ocean after one of strongest earthquakes ever recorded off Russia
news.summary: One of the world's strongest earthquakes struck Russia's Far East on Wednesday as an 8.8-magnitude tremor set off a tsunami in the northern Pacific and prompted warnings for Alaska, Hawaii and south toward New Zealand.

news.title: Row erupts over claim in government report there are ‘not enough builders’ for major infrastructure projects
news.summary: A row has erupted over a government report warning that major state projects are at risk of not being completed due to capacity constraints in the construction sector.

news.title: Patrick Kielty and Cat Deeley were the epitome of TV power couples before shock separation
news.summary: News that  Late Late Show  host Patrick Kielty (54) has split from his TV star wife Cat Deeley (48) has come as a shock for many.

news.title: More health insurance hikes on way, but some cheaper plans being launched
news.summary: Health insurer VHI is to increase the cost of seven plans, just weeks after other hikes.

news.title: Paul Williams: The five biggest challenges that face our new €314,000 Garda Commissioner Justin Kelly
news.summary: The incoming garda commissioner Justin Kelly is taking the reins of the organisation at a time when the demands placed on it by a rapidly changing, complex society are at the highest they have ever been.

news.title: Samuel Ramani: Vladimir Putin has pushed Donald Trump too far, now Russia faces real pain
news.summary: US president Donald Trump has issued a new ultimatum to Russia. If Russia does not pivot towards peace, punitive secondary tariffs and sanctions could take effect.

news.title: Ask a money coach: ‘My fiance and I are struggling with wedding costs. Is there a polite way to ask for cash gifts?’
US confirms 15pc tariff to include pharma, but more ‘horse trading’ yet to come
news.summary: The new tariff on pharma imports to the US from the EU will be 15pc, the White House has confirmed.

news.title: Four-point goal remains on FRC’s radar in further rules trials
news.summary: The inter-county season is over but the work of the Football Review Committee (FRC) continues with a trial game between two Dublin clubs to look at the four-point goal, among other aspects.

news.title: I lost my brother and sister to cancer, while I was being treated for the disease – I now take time to celebrate life
news.summary: As a psychotherapist, Trish Farrell from Dublin City Centre is used to treating people who’ve been traumatised or suffer from serous health issues.
